divs: Sighting DetailsWe have seen this object 3 times this week. It shows up around the same location. It is a very bright light to the eye. Through binoculars it is glowing green and pulsating. Photographs show colors of pink, purple, green and white. The photographs show different shapes and sizes. It moves in all different directions and hovers. Last night when I came inside and looked at it through the window, it moved around a lot more. When I am outside it does not move around as much. It scares my very much.
Summary: Bright glowing green through binoculars. Moved slowly, sometimes faster and hovered.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
